actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that a reenlistment bonus paid to an enlisted member of the Armed Forces shall be paid in the highest applicable amount in effect during the one-year period preceding the end of the member's current enlistment.

summary.text: Requires that a reenlistment bonus be in the highest amount the recipient could have received for reenlisting at any time during the last year his current enlistment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide that a reenlistment bonus paid to an enlisted member of the Armed Forces shall be paid in the highest applicable amount in effect during the one-year period preceding the end of the member's current enlistment.
